description.zh-cn: 东汉末年名将，重信守义，弓马熟练，箭法精良。原为孔融的客将，后归降孙策，助其平定江东。
description.en: A general of the late Eastern Han dynasty, known for his integrity, righteousness, and exceptional archery skills. He first served as a guest general under Kong Rong, later surrendered to Sun Ce and assisted him in conquering Jiangdong.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年名士，官至北海相。
description.en: A renowned scholar of the late Eastern Han dynasty, who served as the Chancellor of Beihai.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年宗室、官员，曾任扬州刺史。
description.en: An imperial clansman and official of the late Eastern Han Dynasty, who served as the Inspector of Yang Province.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年军阀，孙吴政权的奠基者之一。
description.en: A warlord of the late Eastern Han Dynasty and one of the founders of the state of Eastern Wu.

description.zh-cn: 孙吴的开国皇帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the state of Eastern Wu.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉的开国皇帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the state of Shu Han.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年的一支农民起义军队。
description.en: A peasant rebel army during the late Eastern Han Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年黄巾军将领。
description.en: A general of the Yellow Turban Army during the late Eastern Han Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年权臣，曹魏的奠基者。
description.en: A powerful minister of the late Eastern Han Dynasty and the founder of the state of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 刘表从子，以骁勇著称。
description.en: A nephew of Liu Biao, known for his valor.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年至三国时期蜀汉将领。
description.en: A general of Shu Han during the late Eastern Han dynasty and Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 太史慈之子，官至越骑校尉。
description.en: Son of Taishi Ci, who served as a Yueqi Xiaowei (Colonel of Yueqi Cavalry).

description.zh-cn: 东吴将领。
description.en: A general of Eastern Wu.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期由孙权建立的政权。
description.en: A state established by Sun Quan during the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上继西汉之后的大一统王朝。
description.en: A unified dynasty in Chinese history that followed the Western Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 东汉时期东莱郡下辖县，今山东省龙口市。
description.en: A county under Donglai Commandery during the Eastern Han dynasty, located in modern-day Longkou, Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代县名，位于今江西省。
description.en: An ancient county in China, located in modern Jiangxi province.

en: General of the Household Who Breaks Charges

description.zh-cn: 东汉时期的中郎将名号之一。
description.en: A title for a General of the Household during the Eastern Han Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 东汉时期在建昌县设置的军事官职。
description.en: A military position established in Jianchang County during the Eastern Han Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 太史慈是东汉末年的人物。
description.en: Taishi Ci was a figure from the late Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 太史慈是孙吴势力的重要将领。
description.en: Taishi Ci was an important general of the Eastern Wu forces.

description.zh-cn: 太史慈早期曾是孔融的客将。
description.en: In his early career, Taishi Ci served as a guest general under Kong Rong.

description.zh-cn: 在孔融被黄巾军围困时，太史慈为了报恩，单骑突围向刘备求援，帮助孔融解围。
description.en: When Kong Rong was besieged by the Yellow Turban Army, Taishi Ci, to repay a debt of gratitude, broke through the siege alone to seek reinforcements from Liu Bei, helping to lift the siege on Kong Rong.

description.zh-cn: 太史慈在南下后投靠了同乡的扬州刺史刘繇，但未受重用，仅负责前线侦察。
description.en: After heading south, Taishi Ci joined his fellow townsman Liu Yao, the Inspector of Yang Province, but was not given significant responsibilities, only being tasked with front-line reconnaissance.

description.zh-cn: 刘繇兵败后，太史慈归降孙策，并得到其重用。
description.en: After Liu Yao's defeat, Taishi Ci surrendered to Sun Ce and was highly valued by him.

description.zh-cn: 孙策去世后，太史慈继续效力于孙权，并受其委托管理南方要务。
description.en: After Sun Ce's death, Taishi Ci continued to serve Sun Quan and was entrusted with managing affairs in the southern regions.

description.zh-cn: 管亥是黄巾军的一名将领。
description.en: Guan Hai was a general of the Yellow Turban Army.

description.zh-cn: 黄巾军将领管亥率军围困了驻扎在都昌的孔融。
description.en: The Yellow Turban Army general Guan Hai led his forces to besiege Kong Rong, who was stationed in Duchang.

description.zh-cn: 太史慈在神亭岭与孙策相遇并进行了一场不分胜负的单挑。
description.en: Taishi Ci encountered and fought an inconclusive one-on-one duel with Sun Ce at Shenting Ridge.

description.zh-cn: 刘备应太史慈的请求，派遣三千精兵帮助解除了黄巾军对孔融的围困。
description.en: At Taishi Ci's request, Liu Bei dispatched 3,000 elite soldiers to help lift the Yellow Turban Army's siege on Kong Rong.

description.zh-cn: 曹操因听闻太史慈的威名，曾寄送当归给他，意图招揽，但被太史慈拒绝。
description.en: Having heard of Taishi Ci's reputation, Cao Cao once sent him danggui (Chinese angelica) with the intention of recruiting him, but was refused by Taishi Ci.

description.zh-cn: 太史慈受命为建昌都尉，成功镇守防地，使得以骁勇著称的刘磐不再侵扰江东。
description.en: Appointed as the Chief Commandant of Jianchang, Taishi Ci successfully defended the territory, preventing the famously valiant Liu Pan from making further incursions into Jiangdong.

description.zh-cn: 太史慈成功镇守建昌，使得与刘磐一同行动的黄忠也不再侵扰江东。
description.en: Taishi Ci's successful defense of Jianchang also stopped Huang Zhong, who operated with Liu Pan, from raiding Jiangdong.

description.zh-cn: 太史享是太史慈的儿子。
description.en: Taishi Xiang was the son of Taishi Ci.

description.zh-cn: 太史慈于206年逝世后，其在海昏的防务由程普接替。
description.en: After Taishi Ci's death in 206, his defensive duties in Haihun were taken over by Cheng Pu.

position.en: General of the Household Who Breaks Charges

description.zh-cn: 太史慈归降孙策后，被任命为折冲中郎将。
description.en: After surrendering to Sun Ce, Taishi Ci was appointed as General of the Household Who Breaks Charges.

description.zh-cn: 为抵御刘磐，孙策任命太史慈为建昌都尉，负责海昏等地的防务。
description.en: To defend against Liu Pan, Sun Ce appointed Taishi Ci as the Chief Commandant of Jianchang, responsible for the defense of Haihun and other areas.
